text: Poistine, musul'mane i musul'manki, veruyushchiye i veruyushchiya, obrativshiyesya i obrativshiyasya, vernyye i vernyya, pokornyye i pokornyya, dayushchiye i dayushchiya milostynyu, postyashchiyesya i postyashchiyasya, khranyashchiye svoye tselomudriye i khranyashchiya, pominayushchiye i pominayushchiya Allakha mnogo, - ugotoval im Allakh proshcheniye i velikuyu nagradu
